replies.body:
I'm 12, but I believe maturity is more important than age.

I support no sports team. 

I don't know why he was demoted, it's confidential to the senior staff. I believe he must've done something really bad if the entire team isn't allowed to know, but my opinions on him have not changed. He is still quite an awesome guy. The ban I can't say much about since I was at school, but I do believe he was leaking, but I won't have an official decision till I'm shown proof.

I like you, you display your opinions in a good way and don't seem to get frustrated easily unlike a lot of community and staff members. I'd like to talk to you some more if possible.

replies.body: What was the inspiration for your name (and all past names).
replies.body_tagged: What was the inspiration for your name (and all past names).

replies.body:
DaBaderMC- I bought an Xbox and made my name Da Badger for whatever reason, I guess it sounded cool. I then got a minecraft account that belonged to me, and I wanted to name it DaBadger but it didn't work, so I tried DaBadgerMC, it worked, but turned out, I had a typo.

Pyrocumulus- Wanted a cool name, looked up cool phenomenon, and found this. It's like a fiery cloud thing.

TheXiphias- It means TheSwordfish I believe, I thought it looked cool, then realized I couldn't pronounce it.

Rapturous- Looked up "cool synonyms for happy" since my IRL name means happy, and found this.

Gallant- Originally wanted Valiant, but wasn't available.

Snoozin- Loved this name. I love sleeping, so it fit me.

Excellence- Sounded badass.

Eako- Was given to me by FrostedXupcakez, and I'm not planning on changing it any time soon. :^)


Bonus:
NuclearDucky- This was a shared account between me and my 3 siblings. Oldest brother picked the name and we all liked it. None of them really play anymore, but sister jumps on here and there.

Pyrocumulus- Wanted a cool name, looked up cool phenomenon, and found this. It's like a fiery cloud thing.

TheXiphias- It means TheSwordfish I believe, I thought it looked cool, then realized I couldn't pronounce it.
